languages.text: "То, что сотворил жрец в красном... Я чувствовала волю Неумирающего. Он обрек дух машины, как я обрекаю души людей".
"What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."
languages.original_text: "То, что сотворил жрец в красном... Я чувствовала волю Неумирающего. Он обрек дух машины, как я обрекаю души людей".

traits.locale_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."
"What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."
"What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."
"What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."
"What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."

languages.text: "Was der Priester in Rot getan hat ... Ich habe den Willen des Todlosen gespürt. Er hat den Maschinengeist verdammt, so wie ich Seelen verdamme."
languages.original_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."

traits.locale_text: "Was der Priester in Rot getan hat ... Ich habe den Willen des Todlosen gespürt. Er hat den Maschinengeist verdammt, so wie ich Seelen verdamme."

languages.text: « Ce qu'a fait le prêtre vêtu de rouge... J'y ai perçu la volonté de l'Immortel. Il a condamné l'esprit de la machine comme je condamne les âmes de mes victimes. »
languages.original_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qu'a fait le prêtre vêtu de rouge... J'y ai perçu la volonté de l'Immortel. Il a condamné l'esprit de la machine comme je condamne les âmes de mes victimes. »

languages.text: «Lo que el sacerdote rojo hizo... Sentí en ello la voluntad del Inmortal. Condenó al espíritu máquina como yo condeno las almas de la gente».
languages.original_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que el sacerdote rojo hizo... Sentí en ello la voluntad del Inmortal. Condenó al espíritu máquina como yo condeno las almas de la gente».

languages.text: 「赤い服の司祭がしたこと…。不死の者の意志を感じさせた。私が人々の魂を破滅させるように、彼は機械精霊を破滅させたの」
languages.original_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."

traits.locale_text: 「赤い服の司祭がしたこと…。不死の者の意志を感じさせた。私が人々の魂を破滅させるように、彼は機械精霊を破滅させたの」

languages.text: “那位红衣神甫做的事情……让我感觉到了不死之神的意志。他带走了机魂的灵魂，就像我带走人类的灵魂一样。”
languages.original_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."

traits.locale_text: “那位红衣神甫做的事情……让我感觉到了不死之神的意志。他带走了机魂的灵魂，就像我带走人类的灵魂一样。”

languages.original_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."

languages.text: "Kırmızılı rahip ne... Ölmeyen'in arzusunu hissettim. Ben insanların ruhlarını nasıl felakete sürüklediysem o da makine ruhlarını felakete sürükledi."
languages.original_text: "What the priest in red did... I felt the will of the Undying One. He doomed the machine spirit as I doom the souls of people."
